attributes.additional_details:
In February 2010 the House of Commons science and technology committee published the findings from their evidence check on homeopathy. Their findings were unambiguous. Homeopathy is no more effective than any other placebo. The report recommended that "Homeopathy should not be funded on the NHS and the MHRA should stop licensing homeopathic products."

This petition calls on the government to implement the recommendations of this report.
